page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIVITIES - SURVEY
page.content:
{19 - 30 years of age 61% regularly visited a swimming pool 1% were Rugby Club Members 5.5% were members of a Golf Club 22.2% took part in church socual activities
{Over 30 years of age
19.9% regularly visited a swimming pool 2.4% were Judo Club members 1.6% were Karate Club members 3.1% were Rugby Club members 1.6% were Cricket Club members 1.6% were Golf Club members 3.1% took part in church social activities
{All age groups 30.4% thought leisure facilities in the area adequate.
